Posts.Content: Sep 14, 2013 08:27PM nancy2013 wrote: Hi girls, I'm a new one to this board and glad to find so many sisters here. My bmx and recon are scheduled on Sep 25. I'm 44 and have stage 1 on right side and did lumpectomy in August, but the margins were not clear mainly because the dr treated it as regular lump removing biopsy, no LN removed. I also have adh bordering with dcis on the left side. negative on brca test (the result was come out in just one and half weeks from the day drawing the blood) and no family history. I did IVF before. I guess that might contributed something on BC. I also know someone who did ivf and got bc. but the Drs said there's no direct relationship. I hope all of us the best luck.
Posts.Title: September 2013 surgery hobbesla4 Katlebbie
